attributes.description:
Controls how wide the color picker button appears (the small colored square that users click to open the color selection dialog). This determines the size of the color preview button.
CSS variable: --wm-color-picker-container-width

Controls how tall the color picker button appears (the small colored square that users click to open the color selection dialog). This determines the size of the color preview button.
CSS variable: --wm-color-picker-container-height
